mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PROJECT WHERE STATUS_NO = 1 AND MEMBER_NO = #{no} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT(NO, CATEGORY_NO, MEMBER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_PROJECT_NO.NEXTVAL, ${categoryNo}, ${memberNo})
mapper.select: SELECT P.NO , P.STATUS_NO , C.MAIN_CATEGORY , C.SUB_CATEGORY , P.MEMBER_NO , M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , P.TITLE , P.GOAL_AMOUNT , P.IMAGE_URL , P.TXT_DESCRIPTION , P.TXT_BUDGET , P.TXT_SCHEDULE , P.TXT_TEAM , P.TXT_ITEM , P.CURRENT_AMOUNT , P.OK_YN , P.OK_DATE , P.ENROLL_DATE , P.START_DATE , P.END_DATE , P.CAL_DATE , P.DELETE_YN , S.BANK_NAME , S.NAME , S.ACCOUNT_NUM FROM PROJECT P JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_NO = C.NO JOIN SETTLEMENT_INFO S ON P.NO = S.PROJECT_NO WHERE P.NO = ${no} AND P.DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT C.MAIN_CATEGORY, C.SUB_CATEGORY, P.TITLE, P.IMAGE_URL FROM PROJECT P JOIN CATEGORY C ON C.NO = P.CATEGORY_NO WHERE P.NO = ${no} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT TO_CHAR(GOAL_AMOUNT, '999,999,999') AS GOAL_AMOUNT, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE FROM PROJECT WHERE NO = #{no} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT TXT_DESCRIPTION, TXT_BUDGET, TXT_SCHEDULE, TXT_TEAM, TXT_ITEM FROM PROJECT WHERE NO = #{no} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
